The more you verify, the **lower your total cost**.

saas.name: Reacher
saas.heading: **Open-Source Email Verification API**
saas.subheading: Prevent bounced emails with world-class email verification. Free for personal use.

features.name: Yes, it scales
features.desc: Our cutting-edge infrastructure leverages elastic horizontal scaling technology. **Prevent spam sign-ups** on your website, or **clean large lists**, both with Reacher.

features.name: Warp Speeds
features.desc: Reacher is built with the fast and performant [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/) programming language, using the [Warp](https://github.com/seanmonstar/warp) web framework. For real-time email verification, **it's fast**.

features.name: Highest Accuracy Possible
features.desc: We won't play small, this email verification tool actually connects to the mail server and checks in **real-time** if the email exists. We don't use historical data.

features.name: Fully Featured
features.desc: We check for MTA, MX records, SMTP, hard bounces, catch-all, disposable email, role-based accounts... and [much more](https://help.reacher.email/email-attributes-inside-json).

features.name: Privacy Guaranteed
features.desc: It's simple: once you get the result of your email verifications, we delete everything on our side. We are 100% GDPR compliant.

features.name: Free for Personal Use
features.desc: Start with **50 free** emails every month. Scale with our [pay-as-you-go](/pricing) plans afterwards.

features.name: Bulk Verification
features.desc: Clean your large email lists by using our [JavaScript SDK](https://github.com/reacherhq/reacher-js) to perform bulk email verification.

features.name: Powerful API
features.desc: Advanced integrations available programatically via our [REST API](https://help.reacher.email/rest-api-documentation).

features.name: Open-Source
features.desc: In order to guarantee transparency with your data, Reacher is 100% [open-source](https://github.com/reacherhq/backend)! We also offer the possibility to self-host the service yourself.
